description:
Looking for a pickleball club near you? Maybe a swing coach to improve your game? Maybe you’re new to the city and want to join a volleyball league. Reclub is the app that’s powering the global sports community.

Use Reclub to:

DISCOVER. Find sports near you. Pick your city + sport to find other players who love the game as much as you do.
MEET. Make an activity. Play a round robin. Invite your friends to come to the court and join the fun.
RUN A CLUB. Club management made easy. Round robins, leagues and social drop-ins, all done in a few taps.
COMPETE. Setup pickleball tournaments. football competitions, or any other sport in a snap. Brackets, leagues and registration all in one place.
CHAT. Connect with the other athletes. Setup a drop-in with club members.

Terms of service: https://reclub.co/terms-of-service
Privacy policy: https://reclub.co/privacy

Ayo Indonesia is a super sport app that connects players, fans, communities, and sports venue owners from all over Indonesia in one platform.

Through AYO App, you can book your favourite sports venues, find sparring partners, pick up games, competitions, while all your sport statistics such as goals and assists will be recorded!

What are the features available on AYO app?

SPORT VENUE BOOKING
- You no longer need to wait for the response from venue admins to find out venue availability, book directly from AYO app! 
- Large variety of sport venues available on Ayo App from different sports such as football, futsal, mini soccer and tennis. 
- You can choose to pay through down payment or full payment. 
- Various promotions are available when booking venues. 
- Payments can be made through Gopay, Alfamart and Virtual Bank Accounts. 

SPARRING
- Sparring platform with thousands of football, mini soccer, and futsal teams registered.
- Keep track of all your scores and key stats on our platform
- Gamified levels system to rank the quality of teams and players
- Keep playing and win more matches to level up!

OPEN PLAY
- Discover pick up games around your area to join.
- Want to host your own private or public matches? You can do that here!
- Online payment system to ensure all players have paid their match fee.

PROFILES, LEADERBOARD AND BADGES
- Keep track of all the activities and stats on your individual and team profiles.
- Level up through winning games and scoring more goals or assists!
- See how you and your team stack up against other teams on our leaderboard.
- Collect badges and show them off on your profile!
- Watch out for some cool badges to be earned!

Love playing padel but hate spending hours looking for a venue across 10 different websites, apps, and neighborhoods?

Join Courtside, the super sports app that connects padel players to coaches, events, and venues all over Indonesia in one user-friendly app.

Whether you already have friends to play with or are open to meeting new people on the court, Courtside gives you the opportunity to connect with like-minded players and existing friends in exciting venues anywhere in the +62 region. Courtside gives you the ability to create private matches and track who’s coming -  oh, and keep track of their scores as well! 

Playing Padel has never been easier! Search by location , and all that’s left to do is book, pay, and play – in as little as 3 minutes. Cover your court fees and pay via local payment partners. The slot you want is taken? No problem, just let the app notify you when it’s next available. You can also share your next booking through WhatsApp making it easier to remember.

If you’re on the hunt for exciting padel events, Courtside has you covered. Join events all over the country, showcase your mad skills, and have fun with new players all while exploring different clubs and venues. Communities grow, you get better as a player - win-win!

Come see what we have to offer - join us courtside.

Special Reminder: APP data is for reference only and is not used as a medical diagnosis. You should consult your doctor before using APP and making any medical decisions.

1, Home Sports: record your exercise data, set exercise goals and calculate whether the goal is achieved, steps, distance, calorie consumption, etc.;

2. Sleep monitoring: it can record the sleep duration and sleep quality in the set period, and count the duration of deep sleep, light sleep and awake, so that you can improve the sleep quality;

3. When the phone searches for the bracelet, the bracelet vibrates. Find the phone through the bracelet, phone vibration and ring reminder, in case of loss.

4. It can remind the user of important information such as call, SMS, WeChat and so on when connecting with the bracelet, to prevent missing important information, etc.;

5. Set an intelligent alarm clock for the bracelet to remind you of sitting for a long time. The bracelet vibrates to remind you to reduce the problems caused by sitting for a long time

6, Remote control photography mode, anytime and anywhere to record the beautiful moment

7, statistics your daily, monthly, weekly exercise, sleep, data display at a glance

8. You can set the bracelet to turn the wrist to light up the screen and light up the screen easily

9. Sports data report: make statistics of your sports data and average data in the last 30 days, as well as your sports standards in the last seven days, and generate reports for easy viewing of sports trends

Selamat datang di Persija Apps, gerbang revolusioner Anda ke dunia digital Persija. Aplikasi ini akan membawa koneksi kamu dengan Macan Kemayoran ke level berikutnya.

Informasi Terkini, Tangan Pertama : Dapatkan berita terbaru, wawasan mendalam, dan semua yang perlu Anda ketahui tentang Persija. Rasakan denyut nadi klub setiap saat.

Tiket & Pertandingan Live di Ujung Jari : Tidak ada lagi ketinggalan momen emas! Dengan tiket mudah diakses dan update langsung pertandingan, Anda selalu menjadi bagian dari aksi.

Video Persija TV, Lebih Dekat dengan Tim: Langkah ke dalam dunia Persija dengan video eksklusif, wawancara, dan konten di balik layar yang hanya bisa Anda temukan di sini.

Transaksi Mudah dengan QRIS: Nikmati kemudahan bertransaksi, dari pembelian merchandise hingga tiket, dengan metode pembayaran QRIS yang cepat dan aman.

Persija Access : Program Loyalitas untuk Fans Sejati, setiap dukungan kamu untuk Persija kini berbalas. 

Kumpulkan poin loyalitas dan tukarkan dengan tiket gratis, merchandising eksklusif dan berbagai pengalaman tak terlupakan bersama Macan Kemayoran.

Unduh dan Jelajahi Sekarang. Jadilah bagian dari evolusi digital Persija. Persija Apps bukan hanya aplikasi, tapi jembatan yang menghubungkan Anda dengan setiap detak dan semangat Persija. Ayo, bergabunglah dengan kami dan rasakan revolusi digital Persija.

Did you try to play Americano with you Padel-friends? It's awesome!

This app will help you to organize your Americano tournament.

You just have to enter some basic information like the player names, how many courts you are playing on and how many points you are playing from. The app fixes the rest.
All matches are set up for all the rounds necessary for all players to play together with everyone.

The app now support 7 different kinds of Americanos. You can play;
* Normal Americano - All players plays one time with every player
* Mixed Americano - Every round is played with one woman and a man in every team, you play until all women have played in the same team as all men.
* Team Americano - You play as a team, you play until every team has played 1 time against every team
* Mexicano - A fun form of play with the premise that the matches should be as even as possible. The first match is drawn for the participants. After that, the matches are based on the scoreboard.
* Mixicano - Like Mexicano but you will always be drawn a woman and a man in each team!
* Team Mexicano - Like Mexicano but with fixed teams!
* Super Mexicano - Like Mexicano but you can get extra points the closer to the leader-court you are.
You can configure how many super-points you should get, and from what round it should happen.

Americano Padel is designed to support a versatile range of tournament sizes with optimum functionality for groups evenly divisible by 4, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable gaming experience for up to 32 players. For odd-numbered groups, the app is finely tuned to accommodate up to 9 players exceptionally well. There's no cap on participant numbers when diving into any Mexicano format or playing Team Americano, providing endless fun for everyone.

To play on more than one court a premium purchase is required 
Terms of Use: https://perkodar.se/terms

LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Unofficial Companion App
This app is not a game. It is a powerful companion tool designed for football game enthusiasts who want to get more from their experience. Packed with databases, calculators, tutorials, and build tools everything you need to plan your dream team.

PLAYER DATABASE
Explore a detailed player database with smart tools to help you find top talent and understand their strengths.

View player stats at max level.

See dribbling skills with controller animations.

Understand how condition affects stats and ratings.

Instantly spot top 6 key stats on every player card.

Track player form throughout the season.

MANAGER DATABASE
Stay ahead with up-to-date manager formations and tactics.

Find managers who have changed tactics weekly.

Search based on offensive and defensive playstyles.

Use the formation search tool to find your perfect setup.

SQUAD BUILDER
Build squads like a pro, with full control over strength and cost.

Automatically calculate team strength for 2, 3, or 4-star builds.

Position players under different managers.

Save unlimited squads and experiment freely.

Use Auto Build for quick team generation.

Track contract cost totals for better squad planning.

GAME PLAN
Simulate off-the-ball movement in attack and defense to spot tactical strengths and weaknesses in your squad.

HIDDEN GEM FINDER
Discover underrated players with high potential and low contract renewal cost — perfect for long-term builds.

MY TEAM
Save your favorite players and managers to access quickly when building squads or browsing stats.

SKILL MOVE TUTORIALS
Learn how to perform dribbling skills step-by-step with controller animations — for both mobile and console players.

Disclaimer
This is an app designed for learning and planning purposes. It is not affiliated with or endorsed by any football game developer or publisher.

Prepare for fishing trip and find the best fishing times using solunar data, tide prediction, marine and weather forecast.

Fishing Points app enables you to save and find your favourite fishing and hunting locations, spots, trotlines and trolling paths. Suitable for saltwater anglers (inshore or offshore fishing at open seas and oceans) and freshwater anglers (lakes, rivers) applying various fishing techniques fly fishing, bass fishing, boat fishing, kayak fishing, ice fishing.

Know your depths, fish smarter, find and catch more with worldwide nautical charts.

Create a fishing log and save the details of every catch (photos, weight, length). Weather, sun, moon, marine, waves and tide information are added automatically.

FIND YOUR LOCATIONS
• Save fishing locations, hotspots, waypoints with 40+ new markers and 10 colours to choose from
• Record trolling paths and trotlines
• Get information and quickly locate more than 50.000 boat ramps worldwide
• Find saved locations with GPS
• Worldwide nautical charts
• Measure distances
• Set anchor location, monitor your movements and get alerted if you exceed allowed distance

FORECAST
• Daily fish activity forecast
• Best fishing times calendar
• Feeding times (major and minor times)

MARINE FORECAST
• Hourly waves forecast (waves, swell, wind waves)
• Sea temperature (SST)
• Sea currents

WEATHER & TIDES
• Current weather conditions and hourly forecast
• Wind forecast
• Severe weather alerts
• Tide prediction charts
• Barometer and hourly air pressure data
• Rain & Clouds Radar

RIVER DATA 
• Current water levels & flows for 35k+ river stations

SOLUNAR DATA
• Sunrise and sunset times
• Sun positions
• Moonrise and moonset times
• Moon positions
• Moon phases
• Almanac

SYNC DATA
• Access your saved data across all your computer and mobile devices.
• Use Webapp to plan and analyze fishing trips on your computer. Try Webapp on https://web.fishingpoints.app

FISHING LOG
• Save catches and create fishing log
• Share catch photos

SHARE
• Import kmz or gpx files from gps devices or other apps
• Share your locations with friends

Note: App uses your location for navigation, path recording and weather forecast. Continued use of GPS running in the background when navigating or recording paths can dramatically decrease battery life.


The download and usage of Fishing Points App is free of charge. Upgrade to Premium version is available on a yearly or / and monthly subscription basis (price may vary between locations). Should you choose to upgrade to Premium version, payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off in your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be canceled. PadelMix is the all-in-one solution for organizing, managing and sharing your Padel tournaments. It helps you create Americano and Mexicano tournaments, pair-up players in teams and create a full tournament schedule, everything right from your phone! PadelMix also allows you to share your live tournament progress with your friends via a Web URL.

Whether you're a club owner, event organizer, or passionate player, PadelMix puts the power of tournament management right in your pocket!

Create Americano and Mexicano Tournaments

With PadelMix, you can easily set up both Americano and Mexicano tournaments. Our intuitive interface guides you through the process, making it quick and easy to get your tournament off the ground. We support various tournament setup and versatile options: individual players or predefined teams, any number of points per round, any number of courts and more.

Pair-Up Players and Teams

Struggling with team formations? PadelMix has you covered. Our app allows you to pair up players into teams effortlessly, taking the hassle out of team formation.

Create Full Tournament Schedules

With PadelMix, you can create a full tournament schedule right from your phone. Our app allows you to manage time slots, match-ups, and courts, ensuring your tournament runs smoothly.

Share Live Tournament Progress

Keep your friends and fellow Padel enthusiasts in the loop with PadelMix's live sharing feature. Share your live tournament progress via a Web URL, allowing others to follow along and stay updated.

Why Choose PadelMix?
- User-friendly interface
- Comprehensive tournament management
- Live sharing of tournament progress
- Supports both Americano and Mexicano tournaments
- Efficient team formation tool

Download PadelMix today and revolutionize the way you organize and manage your Padel tournaments. Experience the convenience and efficiency of PadelMix and create your first tournament today!

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!

MYLAPS Speedhive App - Live Timing and official race results in one app.
The free MYLAPS Speedhive app gives you quick access to the official results of motorized sport events and with the free introduction version of Live Timing spectators and fans can follow races all over the world. 

Speedhive will help you to:
- View live race data 
- Get quick and easy mobile access to your personal event results
- Connect to your personal MYLAPS account 
- See the history of all your personal event results
- Compare your lap times with other racers in one graph
- Analyze where you won and lost compared to your opponents

LIVE TIMING
With Live Timing in the MYLAPS Speedhive app you are able to view real-time race data of events that support this application.

Live Timing shows:
- Position
- Name
- Total time
- Best lap
- Overall best lap
- Flag color coding

The session data stays temporarily visible after the event. You are able to sort the data by qualifying mode and race mode.
The MYLAPS Speedhive app replaces the current MYLAPS Event Results app and the MYLAPS Live Timing app. Please note that all events that have been uploaded to mylaps.com are available in the app. Live Timing is only available if the event or track supports MYLAPS Live Timing. If you can’t find the event you are looking for in the app or on the website, please contact the race director. Uploading results and distribution of live results is free of charge.

EVENT RESULTS
Rankings
- Overall
- Per class
- Total time
- Best lap
- Share race results (finish position, total laps and best lap time) on all social platforms

Lap analysis for individual racers
- Position changes in the ranking
- All lap times
- Personal best lap
- Difference compared to the best lap
- Difference between you and the racer in front of you 
- Difference between you and the current leader
- Compare your lap times with your opponents in one graph

My Results overview
- Easily see your personal results overview (login required)
- Adjust your sports / country preferences

The app offers results of all kind of motorized sports events worldwide: car racing, motorcycle, karting, stock car, motocross, MX, RC racing and more. Filters for sports, country and date make finding the results even easier.

PROFILE
In the Profile section you’re able to manage your registered MYLAPS transponders and subscriptions. The Profile page gives you a clear overview of your MYLAPS products and subscriptions. You know exactly on what date your subscriptions will end and you can quickly renew your subscriptions within a few taps. Please note that you also need to load new subscriptions on your transponder. Besides you can find detailed product information of your transponders.

A wide range of devices can use the app due to:
- Tablet support
- Landscape mode
- Horizontal scrolling for more data

MYLAPS is continuously improving the Speedhive App and new features will be added. To optimize the app to your needs, we would greatly appreciate it if you could share your input via support.speedhive@mylaps.com.

MYLAPS Speedhive is a service from MYLAPS Sports Timing

There are many obstacles in the narrow parking lot. You need to avoid all the obstacles and leave the parking lot in the correct order. Can you get through these difficulties?

Challenge mode: including simple challenges and difficult challenges. The higher the difficulty, the more rewards.
Sign-in system: obtain coin rewards everyday.
Multiple skinning: various types of cars, different scenes, even car exhaust and NPC obstacles have different designs.

What are you waiting for? Challenge your brain with this tricky game now!

Lvxo — Your Jump & Explosion Training Social Platform
Lvxo, the top space for athletes focusing on leap and burst, is here. Pondering whether to join a plyometric team challenge or swap explosive movement tips, or unsure how to show off your jump progress? The platform has your back. The Training Buddy Connector pairs you with peers chasing similar goals, the Drill Share Hub features community-favorite explosive exercises, and the Progress Tracker lets you post and celebrate your leap gains. Chat to exchange training routines, overcome plateaus, and boost jump power together.
Whether you’re a seasoned athlete or a fitness newbie, Lvxo turns jump and explosion training into an engaging, communal journey.
